00029 void init_comm_options() {
00030   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00031     ("workers", i32(), "Number of worker threads")
00032     ("reactors", i32(), "Number of reactor threads")
00033     ("timeout,t", i32()->default_value(20000),
00034         "System wide timeout in milliseconds")
00035     ;
00036   alias("timeout", "Hypertable.Request.Timeout");
00037 }
00038 
00039 void init_comm() {
00040   int32_t num_cores = System::get_processor_count();
00041 
00042   if (get_bool("verbose"))
00043     std::cout <<"CPU cores count="<< num_cores << std::endl;
00044 
00045   int32_t reactors = get("reactors", num_cores);
00046 
00047   if (!has("reactors"))
00048     properties->add("reactors", reactors);
00049 
00050   ReactorFactory::initialize(reactors);
00051 }

00053 void init_generic_server_options() {
00054   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00055     ("port", i16(), "Listening port")
00056     ("pidfile", str(), "File to contain the process id")
00057     ;
00058 }
00059 
00060 void init_generic_server() {
00061   String pidfile = get("pidfile", String());
00062 
00063   if (pidfile.length()) {
00064     std::ofstream out(pidfile.c_str());
00065     out << System::get_pid() << std::endl;
00066   }
00067 }
